trans-unit.source: Represents image data returned by a decoder and accepted by encoders.
trans-unit.target: 表示图像数据由解码器和接受的编码器。

trans-unit.source: BitmapFrame provides additional functionality not defined by <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource> by providing access to the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame.Thumbnail%2A> associated with a particular frame of an image.
trans-unit.target: BitmapFrame 提供其他功能未定义的<xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource>通过提供对访问<xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame.Thumbnail%2A>与特定帧的映像相关联。</xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame.Thumbnail%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource>

trans-unit.source: BitmapFrame also supports the writing of metadata information by using the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource.Metadata%2A> property or the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame.CreateInPlaceBitmapMetadataWriter%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: BitmapFrame 还通过使用支持的元数据信息编写<xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource.Metadata%2A>属性或<xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame.CreateInPlaceBitmapMetadataWriter%2A>方法。</xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame.CreateInPlaceBitmapMetadataWriter%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource.Metadata%2A>

trans-unit.source: Any BitmapFrame returned from a decoder is always frozen.
trans-unit.target: 从解码器返回任何 BitmapFrame 始终被冻结。

trans-unit.source: If you require a modifiable copy, you must first create a copy of the BitmapFrame by using the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource.Clone%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 如果你需要的可修改副本，首先必须通过创建一份 BitmapFrame<xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource.Clone%2A>方法。</xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource.Clone%2A>

trans-unit.source: Only [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_tiff](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-tiff-md.md)] and [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_gif](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-gif-md.md)] format images support multiple frames.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame"></xref> class.
When overridden in a derived class, gets or sets a value that represents the base <xref:System.Uri> of the current context.
trans-unit.target: 当在派生类中重写，获取或设置一个值，该值表示为底<xref:System.Uri>的当前上下文。</xref:System.Uri>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Uri> of the current context.

When overridden in a derived class, gets a collection of <xref href="System.Windows.Media.ColorContext"></xref> objects that are associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 当在派生类中重写，获取的集合<xref href="System.Windows.Media.ColorContext"></xref>与此关联的对象<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: A read-only collection of <xref href="System.Windows.Media.ColorContext"></xref> objects that are associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 只读集合<xref href="System.Windows.Media.ColorContext"></xref>与此关联的对象<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Creates a new <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame"></xref> from a given <xref:System.IO.Stream>.
The `bitmapStream` can be closed after the frame is created only when the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapCacheOption> cache option is used.
trans-unit.target: `bitmapStream`之后创建框架时，才可以关闭<xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapCacheOption>使用缓存选项。</xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapCacheOption>

trans-unit.source: The default <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapCacheOption> cache option retains the stream until the frame is needed.
trans-unit.target: 默认值<xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapCacheOption>缓存选项保留流，直至需要框架为止。</xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapCacheOption>

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame.Create%28System.IO.Stream%2CSystem.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapCreateOptions%2CSystem.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapCacheOption%29> method to specify create and cache options.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame.Create%28System.IO.Stream%2CSystem.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapCreateOptions%2CSystem.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapCacheOption%29>方法，以指定创建和缓存选项。</xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame.Create%28System.IO.Stream%2CSystem.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapCreateOptions%2CSystem.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapCacheOption%29>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IO.Stream> that is used to construct the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame"></xref>.
A <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame"></xref> from a given <xref:System.IO.Stream>.
Creates a new <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame"></xref> from a given <xref:System.Uri>.
The <xref:System.Uri> that identifies the source of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame"></xref>.
A <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame"></xref> from a given <xref:System.Uri>.
Creates a new <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame"></xref> from a given <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource"></xref>.
The <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource"></xref> that is used to construct this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame"></xref>.
A <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame"></xref> from a given <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource"></xref>.
Creates a <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame"></xref> from a given <xref:System.Uri> with the specified <xref href="System.Net.Cache.RequestCachePolicy"></xref>.
Create is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5.
trans-unit.target: 创建.NET Framework 3.5 版中引入。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[版本和依赖关系](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: The location of the bitmap from which the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame"></xref> is created.
The caching requirements for this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame"></xref>.
A <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame"></xref> from a given <xref:System.Uri> with the specified <xref href="System.Net.Cache.RequestCachePolicy"></xref>.
Creates a new <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame"></xref> from a given <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource"></xref> with the specified thumbnail.
trans-unit.target: 创建一个新<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame"></xref>从给定<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource"></xref>使用指定的缩略图。

trans-unit.source: The source from which the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame"></xref> is constructed.
A thumbnail image of the resulting <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame"></xref>.
A <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame"></xref> from a given <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource"></xref> with the specified thumbnail.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame"> </xref>从给定<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource"></xref>使用指定的缩略图。

trans-unit.source: Creates a new <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame"></xref> from a given <xref:System.IO.Stream> with the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapCreateOptions"></xref> and <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapCacheOption"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 创建一个新<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame"></xref>从给定<xref:System.IO.Stream>具有指定<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapCreateOptions"></xref>和<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapCacheOption"> </xref>。</xref:System.IO.Stream>

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapCacheOption> cache option if you wish to close the `bitmapStream` after the bitmap is created.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapCacheOption>缓存选项，如果你想要关闭`bitmapStream`创建位图后。</xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapCacheOption>

trans-unit.source: The default <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapCacheOption> cache option retains access to the stream until the bitmap is needed and cleanup is handled by the garbage collector.
trans-unit.target: 默认值<xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapCacheOption>缓存选项保留对流的访问权限，直至需要位图和清理由垃圾回收器。</xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapCacheOption>

trans-unit.source: The stream from which this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame"></xref> is constructed.
The options that are used to create this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame"></xref>.
The cache option that is used to create this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame"></xref>.

A <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame"></xref> from a given <xref:System.IO.Stream> with the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapCreateOptions"></xref> and <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapCacheOption"></xref>.

Creates a <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame"></xref> from a given <xref:System.Uri> with the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapCreateOptions"></xref> and <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapCacheOption"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 创建<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame"></xref>从给定<xref:System.Uri>具有指定<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapCreateOptions"></xref>和<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapCacheOption"> </xref>。</xref:System.Uri>

trans-unit.source: The location of the bitmap from which the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame"></xref> is created.
The options that are used to create this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame"></xref>.
The cache option that is used to create this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame"></xref>.

A <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame"></xref> from a given <xref:System.Uri> with the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapCreateOptions"></xref>, and <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapCacheOption"></xref>.

Creates a <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame"></xref> from a given <xref:System.Uri> with the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapCreateOptions"></xref>, <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapCacheOption"></xref>, and <xref href="System.Net.Cache.RequestCachePolicy"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 创建<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame"></xref>从给定<xref:System.Uri>具有指定<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapCreateOptions"> </xref>， <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapCacheOption"> </xref>，和<xref href="System.Net.Cache.RequestCachePolicy"> </xref>。</xref:System.Uri>

trans-unit.target: 创建.NET Framework 3.5 版中引入。

The options that are used to create this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame"></xref>.
The cache option that is used to create this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame"></xref>.
The caching requirements for this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame"></xref>.

A <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame"></xref> from a given <xref:System.Uri> with the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapCreateOptions"></xref>, <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapCacheOption"></xref>, and <xref href="System.Net.Cache.RequestCachePolicy"></xref>.

trans-unit.source: Creates a new <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame"></xref> from a given <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource"></xref> with the specified thumbnail, <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapMetadata"></xref>, and <xref href="System.Windows.Media.ColorContext"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 创建一个新<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame"></xref>从给定<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource"></xref>使用指定的缩略图、 <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapMetadata"> </xref>，和<xref href="System.Windows.Media.ColorContext"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource"></xref> that is used to construct this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame"></xref>.
A thumbnail image of the resulting <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame"></xref>.
The metadata to associate with this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame"></xref>.
The <xref href="System.Windows.Media.ColorContext"></xref> objects that are associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame"></xref>.

A <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame"></xref> from a given <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource"></xref> with the specified thumbnail, <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapMetadata"></xref>, and <xref href="System.Windows.Media.ColorContext"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame"> </xref>从给定<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource"></xref>使用指定的缩略图、 <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapMetadata"> </xref>，和<xref href="System.Windows.Media.ColorContext"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, creates an instance of <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.InPlaceBitmapMetadataWriter"></xref>, which can be used to associate metadata with a <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 当在派生类中重写时创建的实例<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.InPlaceBitmapMetadataWriter"> </xref>，可用于关联元数据与<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Metadata can only be added or edited using the CreateInPlaceBitmapMetadataWriter if the image file contains enough room for the new metadata; otherwise, metadata can be added using the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource.Metadata%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 元数据仅可以添加或编辑使用 CreateInPlaceBitmapMetadataWriter 如果图像文件包含为新的元数据; 足够的空间否则，元数据可以使用添加<xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource.Metadata%2A>属性。</xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource.Metadata%2A>

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.InPlaceBitmapMetadataWriter"></xref>.
When overridden in a derived class, gets the decoder associated with this instance of <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 当在派生类中重写，获取与此实例关联的解码器<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapDecoder"></xref> that is associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame"></xref>.
When overridden in a derived class, gets the thumbnail image associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 当在派生类中重写，获取与此相关的缩略图<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource"></xref> that represents a thumbnail of the current <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame"></xref>.
